page.title: 06The Wragby Calendar
page.content: {School Sports'Day}in June or early July is next.After that there is the { {School Fayre}organised by the Parent/ Teacher Association when the children do displays and there are stalls to raise money. The{Wragby Show}in August is the big event.There are stalls and displays of agricultural interest, together with competitions for such things as flowers,produce and handicrafts. On November 5th. there is a { {bonfire and firework display}on the playing field behind the Town Hall,and things like hot dogs,jacket potatoes and toffee apples are on sale. At Christmas-time,the Church choir and anyone else interested go{carol- {singing}around Wragby.
